cells.data:
#### Life Cycle
![Screen Shot 2018-03-05 at 7.14.07 PM.png](quiver-image-url/F05942A1F7364458C250BB27FF410EEB.png =670x659)
* JSP: use regular HTML for most of page, mark servlet code with special tags and then entire JSP page gets translated into a Servlet and Servlet is what actually gets invoked for each request
* JSP Expression: <% = Java Expression %>
  * Result: expression evaluated converted to String and place into HTML page
